actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Mining and Natural Resources.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Mining and Natural Resources

official_title: To delay the lease sale of certain minerals located in Bezetta Township, Trumbull county, Ohio.

summary.text: Prohibits the Secretary of the Interior from offering for lease sale any of the mineral rights of the United States in a certain tract of land in Bezetta Township, Trumbull County, Ohio, until one year after the enactment of this Act.

titles.title: To delay the lease sale of certain minerals located in Bezetta Township, Trumbull county, Ohio.
